verses.verse: וַיִּקְח֣וּ <WH3947> took בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> the sons אַ֠הֲרֹן <WH175> of Aaron נָדָ֨ב <WH5070> And Nadab וַאֲבִיה֜וּא <WH30> and Abihu אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> either מַחְתָּת֗וֹ <WH4289> of them his censer וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> and put בָהֵן֙ <WH2004> therein אֵ֔שׁ <WH784> fire וַיָּשִׂ֥ימוּ <WH7760> and put עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and קְטֹ֑רֶת <WH7004> incense וַיַּקְרִ֜בוּ <WH7126> thereon and offered לִפְנֵ֤י <WH6440> before יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> the LORD אֵ֣שׁ <WH784> fire זָרָ֔ה <WH2114> strange אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> which לֹ֦א <WH3808> had not צִוָּ֖ה <WH6680> which he commanded אֹתָֽם׃ <WH853>

וַתֵּ֥צֵא <WH3318> And there went out אֵ֛שׁ <WH784> fire מִלִּפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> from the LORD וַתֹּ֣אכַל <WH398> and devoured אוֹתָ֑ם <WH853> וַיָּמֻ֖תוּ <WH4191> them and they died לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיֹּ֨אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> Then Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> unto Aaron הוּא֩ <WH1931> It אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> is what דִּבֶּ֨ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֤ה ׀ <WH3068> This [is it] that the LORD לֵאמֹר֙ <WH559> saying בִּקְרֹבַ֣י <WH7138> in them that come nigh אֶקָּדֵ֔שׁ <WH6942> I will be sanctified וְעַל־ <WH5921> and פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> me and before כָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> all the people אֶכָּבֵ֑ד <WH3513> I will be glorified וַיִּדֹּ֖ם <WH1826> held his peace אַהֲרֹֽן׃ <WH175> And Aaron

וַיִּקְרָ֣א <WH7121> called מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶל־ <WH413> to מִֽישָׁאֵל֙ <WH4332> Mishael וְאֶ֣ל <WH413> and אֶלְצָפָ֔ן <WH469> and Elzaphan בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> the sons עֻזִּיאֵ֖ל <WH5816> of Uzziel דֹּ֣ד <WH1730> the uncle אַהֲרֹ֑ן <WH175> of Aaron וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶ֗ם <WH413> to קִ֠רְב֞וּ <WH7126> unto them Come near שְׂא֤וּ <WH5375> carry אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחֵיכֶם֙ <WH251> your brethren מֵאֵ֣ת <WH853> פְּנֵי־ <WH6440> from before הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> the sanctuary אֶל־ <WH413> about מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> out לַֽמַּחֲנֶֽה׃ <WH4264> of the camp

וַֽיִּקְרְב֗וּ <WH7126> So they went near וַיִּשָּׂאֻם֙ <WH5375> and carried בְּכֻתֳּנֹתָ֔ם <WH3801> them in their coats אֶל־ <WH413> about מִח֖וּץ <WH2351> out לַֽמַּחֲנֶ֑ה <WH4264> of the camp כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> had said מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> as Moses

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said מֹשֶׁ֣ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֡ן <WH175> unto Aaron וּלְאֶלְעָזָר֩ <WH499> and unto Eleazar וּלְאִֽיתָמָ֨ר ׀ <WH385> and unto Ithamar בָּנָ֜יו <WH1121> his sons רָֽאשֵׁיכֶ֥ם <WH7218> not your heads אַל־ <WH408> not תִּפְרָ֣עוּ ׀ <WH6544> Uncover וּבִגְדֵיכֶ֤ם <WH899> your clothes לֹֽא־ <WH3808> nor תִפְרֹ֙מוּ֙ <WH6533> neither rend וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> nor תָמֻ֔תוּ <WH4191> lest ye die וְעַ֥ל <WH5921> against כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעֵדָ֖ה <WH5712> come upon all the people יִקְצֹ֑ף <WH7107> and lest wrath וַאֲחֵיכֶם֙ <WH251> but let your brethren כָּל־ <WH3605> the whole בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> the whole house יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel יִבְכּוּ֙ <WH1058> bewail אֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׂרֵפָ֔ה <WH8316> the burning אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which שָׂרַ֥ף <WH8313> hath kindled יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> which the LORD

וּמִפֶּתַח֩ <WH6607> from the door אֹ֨הֶל <WH168> of the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֜ד <WH4150> of the congregation לֹ֤א <WH3808> even תֵֽצְאוּ֙ <WH3318> And ye shall not go out פֶּן־ <WH6435> or תָּמֻ֔תוּ <WH4191> lest ye die כִּי־ <WH3588> for שֶׁ֛מֶן <WH8081> oil מִשְׁחַ֥ת <WH4888> for the anointing יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD עֲלֵיכֶ֑ם <WH5921> and וַֽיַּעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> [is] upon you And they did כִּדְבַ֥ר <WH1697> according to the word מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> of Moses פ
וַיְדַבֵּ֣ר <WH1696> spake יְהוָ֔ה <WH3069> God אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֖ן <WH175> unto Aaron לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> saying

יַ֣יִן <WH3196> wine וְשֵׁכָ֞ר <WH7941> nor strong drink אַל־ <WH408> nor תֵּ֣שְׁתְּ ׀ <WH8354> Do not drink אַתָּ֣ה ׀ <WH859> you וּבָנֶ֣יךָ <WH1121> thou nor thy sons אִתָּ֗ךְ <WH854> for בְּבֹאֲכֶ֛ם <WH935> with thee when ye go אֶל־ <WH413> into אֹ֥הֶל <WH168> into the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֖ד <WH4150> of the congregation וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> you will not תָמֻ֑תוּ <WH4191> lest ye die חֻקַּ֥ת <WH2708> [it shall be] a statute עוֹלָ֖ם <WH5769> for ever לְדֹרֹתֵיכֶֽם׃ <WH1755> throughout your generations

וּֽלֲהַבְדִּ֔יל <WH914> And that ye may put difference בֵּ֥ין <WH996> between הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> between holy וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> and between הַחֹ֑ל <WH2455> and unholy וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הַטָּמֵ֖א <WH2931> and between unclean וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between הַטָּהֽוֹר׃ <WH2889> and clean

וּלְהוֹרֹ֖ת <WH3384> And that ye may teach אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel אֵ֚ת <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַ֣חֻקִּ֔ים <WH2706> all the statutes אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which דִּבֶּ֧ר <WH1696> hath spoken יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> which the LORD אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> to בְּיַד־ <WH3027> unto them by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <WH4872> of Moses פ

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> spake מֹשֶׁ֜ה <WH4872> And Moses אֶֽל־ <WH413> to אַהֲרֹ֗ן <WH175> unto Aaron וְאֶ֣ל <WH413> about אֶ֠לְעָזָר <WH499> and unto Eleazar וְאֶל־ <WH413> and אִ֨יתָמָ֥ר ׀ <WH385> and unto Ithamar בָּנָיו֮ <WH1121> his sons הַנּֽוֹתָרִים֒ <WH3498> that were left קְח֣וּ <WH3947> Take אֶת־ <WH853> הַמִּנְחָ֗ה <WH4503> the meat offering הַנּוֹתֶ֙רֶת֙ <WH3498> that remaineth מֵאִשֵּׁ֣י <WH801> made by fire יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְאִכְל֥וּהָ <WH398> and eat מַצּ֖וֹת <WH4682> it without leaven אֵ֣צֶל <WH681> beside הַמִּזְבֵּ֑חַ <WH4196> the altar כִּ֛י <WH3588> for קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> for it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> holy הִֽוא׃ <WH1931> You

וַאֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <WH398> And ye shall eat אֹתָהּ֙ <WH853> בְּמָק֣וֹם <WH4725> place קָדֹ֔שׁ <WH6918> it in the holy כִּ֣י <WH3588> because חָקְךָ֤ <WH2706> because it [is] thy due וְחָק־ <WH2706> due בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1121> and thy sons' הִ֔וא <WH1931> he מֵאִשֵּׁ֖י <WH801> made by fire יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּי־ <WH3588> because כֵ֖ן <WH3651> thus צֻוֵּֽיתִי׃ <WH6680> for so I am commanded

וְאֵת֩ <WH853> חֲזֵ֨ה <WH2373> breast הַתְּנוּפָ֜ה <WH8573> And the wave וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> שׁ֣וֹק <WH7785> shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֗ה <WH8641> and heave תֹּֽאכְלוּ֙ <WH398> shall ye eat בְּמָק֣וֹם <WH4725> place טָה֔וֹר <WH2889> in a clean אַתָּ֕ה <WH859> you וּבָנֶ֥יךָ <WH1121> thou and thy sons וּבְנֹתֶ֖יךָ <WH1323> and thy daughters אִתָּ֑ךְ <WH854> for כִּֽי־ <WH3588> as חָקְךָ֤ <WH2706> with thee for [they be] thy due וְחָק־ <WH2706> due בָּנֶ֙יךָ֙ <WH1121> and thy sons' נִתְּנ֔וּ <WH5414> [which] are given מִזִּבְחֵ֥י <WH2077> out of the sacrifices שַׁלְמֵ֖י <WH8002> of peace offerings בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel

שׁ֣וֹק <WH7785> shoulder הַתְּרוּמָ֞ה <WH8641> The heave וַחֲזֵ֣ה <WH2373> breast הַתְּנוּפָ֗ה <WH8573> and the wave עַ֣ל <WH5921> along אִשֵּׁ֤י <WH801> with the offerings made by fire הַחֲלָבִים֙ <WH2459> of the fat יָבִ֔יאוּ <WH935> shall they bring לְהָנִ֥יף <WH5130> to wave תְּנוּפָ֖ה <WH8573> [it for] a wave offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> the LORD וְהָיָ֨ה <WH1961> become לְךָ֜ וּלְבָנֶ֤יךָ <WH1121> and it shall be thine and thy sons' אִתְּךָ֙ <WH854> for לְחָק־ <WH2706> with thee by a statute עוֹלָ֔ם <WH5769> for ever כַּאֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> after צִוָּ֥ה <WH6680> hath commanded יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> as the LORD

וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> שְׂעִ֣יר <WH8163> the goat הַֽחַטָּ֗את <WH2403> of the sin offering דָּרֹ֥שׁ <WH1875> diligently דָּרַ֛שׁ <WH1875> sought מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> And Moses וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold שֹׂרָ֑ף <WH8313> and behold it was burnt וַ֠יִּקְצֹף <WH7107> and he was angry עַל־ <WH5921> and אֶלְעָזָ֤ר <WH499> with Eleazar וְעַל־ <WH5921> and אִֽיתָמָר֙ <WH385> and Ithamar בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the sons אַהֲרֹ֔ן <WH175> of Aaron הַנּוֹתָרִ֖ם <WH3498> [which were] left לֵאמֹֽר׃ <WH559> [alive] saying

מַדּ֗וּעַ <WH4069> Why לֹֽא־ <WH3808> not אֲכַלְתֶּ֤ם <WH398> Wherefore have ye not eaten אֶת־ <WH853> הַחַטָּאת֙ <WH2403> the sin offering בִּמְק֣וֹם <WH4725> place הַקֹּ֔דֶשׁ <WH6944> in the holy כִּ֛י <WH3588> for קֹ֥דֶשׁ <WH6944> seeing it [is] most קָֽדָשִׁ֖ים <WH6944> holy הִ֑וא <WH1931> he וְאֹתָ֣הּ ׀ <WH853> נָתַ֣ן <WH5414> and [God] hath given לָכֶ֗ם לָשֵׂאת֙ <WH5375> it you to bear אֶת־ <WH853> עֲוֹ֣ן <WH5771> the iniquity הָעֵדָ֔ה <WH5712> of the congregation לְכַפֵּ֥ר <WH3722> to make atonement עֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH5921> and לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> for them before יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

הֵ֚ן <WH2005> Behold לֹא־ <WH3808> had not הוּבָ֣א <WH935> of it was not brought אֶת־ <WH853> דָּמָ֔הּ <WH1818> the blood אֶל־ <WH413> into הַקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> the holy פְּנִ֑ימָה <WH6441> in within אָכ֨וֹל <WH398> [place] ye should indeed תֹּאכְל֥וּ <WH398> have eaten אֹתָ֛הּ <WH853> בַּקֹּ֖דֶשׁ <WH6944> it in the holy כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> I צִוֵּֽיתִי׃ <WH6680> [place] as I commanded

וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <WH1696> said אַהֲרֹ֜ן <WH175> And Aaron אֶל־ <WH413> to מֹשֶׁ֗ה <WH4872> unto Moses הֵ֣ן <WH2005> Behold הַ֠יּוֹם <WH3117> Behold this day הִקְרִ֨יבוּ <WH7126> have they offered אֶת־ <WH853> חַטָּאתָ֤ם <WH2403> their sin offering וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֹֽלָתָם֙ <WH5930> and their burnt offering לִפְנֵ֣י <WH6440> before יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וַתִּקְרֶ֥אנָה <WH7122> and such things have befallen אֹתִ֖י <WH853> כָּאֵ֑לֶּה <WH428> these וְאָכַ֤לְתִּי <WH398> me and [if] I had eaten חַטָּאת֙ <WH2403> the sin offering הַיּ֔וֹם <WH3117> to day הַיִּיטַ֖ב <WH3190> should it have been accepted בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD
וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard מֹשֶׁ֔ה <WH4872> And when Moses וַיִּיטַ֖ב <WH3190> seemed בְּעֵינָֽיו׃ <WH5869> his sight פ
